column1: Experience unparalleled creativity with the sophisticated HP Envy Desktop PC. Designed to empower your creative endeavors, this sleek desktop boasts cutting-edge Intel® Processor technology and generous storage capacity. Enjoy seamless software performance facilitated by intelligently engineered thermal vents, enhancing airflow while minimizing noise. Elevate your entertainment with support for immersive 5.1 Surround Sound.
Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-13400 (up to 4.6 GHz with Intel® Turbo Boost Technology, 20 MB L3 cache, 10 cores, 16 threads)
Memory: 8 GB DDR4-3200 MHz RAM (2 x 4 GB)
Memory Card Device: HP 3-in-1 memory card reader
Storage: 256 GB PCIe® NVMe™ M.2 SSD
Keyboard and Mouse: HP 310 Black Wired Keyboard and mouse combo
External I/O Ports: Front: 1 USB Type-C® 5Gbps signaling rate
Wireless Technology: Realtek RTL8852BE Wi-Fi 6 (2x2) and Bluetooth®️ 5.3 compatible combo (supporting gigabit data rate)
Chassis & Power Supply: Front Bezel Nightfall Black Plastic with 400 W 80 Plus Gold certified power supply
Various configurations for operating system, processor, graphics, memory, storage, keyboard and mouse, office software, and security software.
Dimensions (W X D X H): 6.12 x 11.97 x 13.28 in
1-year limited hardware warranty. Additional information available at www.support.hp.com
column2: 1-year limited technical support for software and initial setup (from date of purchase)
